text.div:
DocumentMode

Whether the application produces or consumes documents.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/document-mode defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
producer ProducerThe application produces documents of the specified type.
consumer ConsumerThe application consumes documents of the specified type.

name: DocumentMode
description: Whether the application produces or consumes documents.

concept.definition: The application produces documents of the specified type.
The application consumes documents of the specified type.
